mapper.sql: id, run_info_id AS runInfoId, verify_user_id AS verifyUserId, verify_user_name AS verifyUserName, verify_status AS verifyStatus, verify_desc AS verifyDesc, verify_date AS verifyDate, task_name AS taskName, business_type AS businessType, business_id AS businessId
mapper.select: select w.verify_user_name as verifyUserName, w.task_name as taskName, w.verify_status as verifyStatus, w.verify_date as verifyDate, w.verify_desc as verifyDesc from bpm_verify_info w where w.business_id = #{business_id}

select t.ID_ as id, t.NAME_ AS taskName, t.ASSIGNEE_ AS verifyUserId, t.ASSIGNEE_NAME as verifyUserName, '处理中' AS verifyStatusName, null AS verifyDate, '' AS verifyDesc, t.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS elementId from act_ru_task t where t.PROC_INST_ID_=#{procInstId}

select w.id as id, w.verify_user_name as verifyUserName, w.task_name as taskName, w.process_code as processCode from bpm_verify_info w where 1=1
and w.process_code in
#{item}
order by w.verify_date asc
